query:
UPDATE membershipTiers 
SET features = '["Unlimited workshops per month","Monthly live training","Workshop recordings access","Full access to tools & prompts library (lifetime)","2 hours strategy monthly","Security checklists","Priority support","Custom integrations"]',
    workshopTokensPerMonth = 999
WHERE slug = 'pro';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Mhpd8nk54dx6w3.root --database e9RJaE3TPmF4zsnh5FSQoP --execute UPDATE membershipTiers 
SET features = '["Unlimited workshops per month","Monthly live training","Workshop recordings access","Full access to tools & prompts library (lifetime)","2 hours strategy monthly","Security checklists","Priority support","Custom integrations"]',
    workshopTokensPerMonth = 999
WHERE slug = 'pro';
